org.cougaar.core.wp.bootstrap.http
Class HttpDiscovery

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.util.GenericStateModelAdapter
      org.cougaar.core.wp.bootstrap.DiscoveryBase
          org.cougaar.core.wp.bootstrap.http.HttpDiscovery
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, GenericStateModel
public class HttpDiscovery
extends DiscoveryBase

This component discovers bundles through HTTP by using a URLConnection.

It looks in the ConfigService for config entries of type "-HTTP_REG" and scheme "http", or "-HTTPS_REG" and "https", e.g.

   X={-HTTP_REG=http://test.com:8800}
and then polls the HTTP server on that host:port for a page that lists Bundles encoded as text. If the URL lacks a path then a default path of "/$~/wp_bootstrap" is assumed. These bundles are then copied into the DiscoveryService.
